EDCodex.full_panel.text:
1. Open the Codex from right hand cockpit panel.
2. Draw a rectangle from the top left corner of the codex 'book' to the end 
of the line above the exit button at the bottom right.

EDInternalStatusPanel.panel_bounds1.text:
1. Open Internal Status Panel (right hand panel).
2. Draw a rectangle from the top left corner of the nav panel to the bottom right corner.

EDInternalStatusPanel.panel_bounds2.text:
1. Open Internal Status Panel (right hand panel).
2. Draw a rectangle from the bottom left corner of the nav panel to the top right corner.

EDStationServicesInShip.station_services.text:
1. Open Station Service.
2. Draw a rectangle from the top left of the left panel box to the bottom right of the right panel box.

EDStationServicesInShip.commodities_mark.text: This is calculated automatically from the Codex screen values. Do not change.

EDGalaxyMap.full_panel.text: This is calculated automatically from the Codex screen values. Do not change.

EDSystemMap.full_panel.text: This is calculated automatically from the Codex screen values. Do not change.

EDNavigationPanel.panel_bounds1.text:
1. Open Navigation Panel.
2. Draw a rectangle from the top left corner of the nav panel to the bottom right corner.

EDNavigationPanel.panel_bounds2.text:
1. Open Navigation Panel.
2. Draw a rectangle from the bottom left corner of the nav panel to the top right corner.
